name: py-pycortex
description: Python Cortical mapping software for fMRI data.

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-wheel
dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-cython
dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.

dependencies.name: py-future
dependencies.description: Clean single-source support for Python 3 and 2

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description:
NumPy is the fundamental package for scientific computing with Python.
It contains among other things: a powerful N-dimensional array object,
sophisticated (broadcasting) functions, tools for integrating C/C++ and
Fortran code, and useful linear algebra, Fourier transform, and random
number capabilities

dependencies.name: py-scipy
dependencies.description:
SciPy (pronounced "Sigh Pie") is a Scientific Library for Python. It
provides many user-friendly and efficient numerical routines such as
routines for numerical integration and optimization.

dependencies.name: py-tornado
dependencies.description: Tornado is a Python web framework and asynchronous networking library.

dependencies.name: py-shapely
dependencies.description: Manipulation and analysis of geometric objects in the Cartesian plane.

dependencies.name: py-lxml
dependencies.description:
lxml is the most feature-rich and easy-to-use library for processing XML
and HTML in the Python language.

dependencies.name: py-html5lib
dependencies.description: HTML parser based on the WHATWG HTML specification.

dependencies.name: py-h5py
dependencies.description:
The h5py package provides both a high- and low-level interface to the
HDF5 library from Python.

dependencies.name: py-numexpr
dependencies.description: Fast numerical expression evaluator for NumPy

dependencies.name: py-matplotlib
dependencies.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.

dependencies.name: pil
dependencies.description:
The Python Imaging Library (PIL) adds image processing capabilities to
your Python interpreter. This library supports many file formats, and
provides powerful image processing and graphics capabilities.

dependencies.name: py-nibabel
dependencies.description: Access a multitude of neuroimaging data formats

dependencies.name: py-networkx
dependencies.description:
NetworkX is a Python package for the creation, manipulation, and study
of the structure, dynamics, and functions of complex networks.

dependencies.name: py-imageio
dependencies.description:
Python library for reading and writing image data. Imageio is a Python
library that provides an easy interface to read and write a wide range
of image data, including animated images, video, volumetric data, and
scientific formats. It is cross-platform, runs on Python 2.7 and 3.4+,
and is easy to install.

dependencies.name: py-wget
dependencies.description:
pure python download utility Download the file for your platform. If
you're not sure which to choose, learn more about installing packages.
